function Rating(props) { const {rating, numReviews} = props; return (
= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 0.5 ? 'fas fa-start-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}/> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 1 ? 'fas fa-start-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}/> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 2.5 ? 'fas fa-start-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}/> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 3.5 ? 'fas fa-start-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}/> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 4.5 ? 'fas fa-start-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}/> = 6 ? 'fas fa-star' : rating >= 5.5 ? 'fas fa-start-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}/>
); } export default Rating;
